title: 1943년 Scott 사건
summary: 미국 Georgia, GA 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Scott. 판결일: 1943-03-09. 법원: Court of Appeals of Georgia.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Scott v. Torrance.
**판결일**: 1943-03-09
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Georgia
**관할**: Georgia, GA

**판사**: Broyles, Gardner, MacIntyre

## 변호인

E. W. Maynard, S. G. Jones, E. P. Johnston, Musser, Kimber   Huffman, Carlyle Giles,  for plaintiff.

 Hines  Carpenter, Marion Ennis, Harris, Russell, Weaver   Land,  for defendant.

## 인용

- 25 S.E.2d 120
- 69 Ga. App. 309

## 판결문 요약

In my opinion the evidence demanded a finding that the plaintiff was not dependent upon her son, Ralph Scott, within the meaning of the statute (Code, § 105-1307); and therefore the court did not err in denying a new trial....

sources.name: Harvard Law - Case Law Access Project
